text: Does Julia use BLAS/LAPACK/other external libraries, or is it pure JITed Julia?

elements.text: Does Julia use BLAS/LAPACK/other external libraries, or is it pure JITed Julia?

text: That said, there is a library called Octavian.jl that is looking to be a blas replacement. It already beats openblas by a wide margin, and is fairly competitive with mkl for some cases

elements.text: That said, there is a library called Octavian.jl that is looking to be a blas replacement. It already beats openblas by a wide margin, and is fairly competitive with mkl for some cases

text: Right, but BLAS/LAPACK aren't the only external libraries Julia base is using

elements.text: Right, but BLAS/LAPACK aren't the only external libraries Julia base is using
